crossIndustryInsights.observation: Healthcare uses triaging to classify urgency and route patients
crossIndustryInsights.application: Implement AI Readiness Triage Score (0-100) to classify companies by urgency

crossIndustryInsights.observation: Medical diagnostics communicate certainty levels to manage expectations
crossIndustryInsights.application: Add confidence scores to ROI calculations and show data quality indicators

crossIndustryInsights.observation: Healthcare UX reveals complexity gradually based on patient needs
crossIndustryInsights.application: Create Express Mode (3 min) vs Deep Dive Mode (15 min) for different personas

crossIndustryInsights.observation: Medical systems have structured post-treatment monitoring
crossIndustryInsights.application: Implement 30/60/90-day check-ins to track AI adoption progress

crossIndustryInsights.observation: Healthcare uses visual aids (X-rays, charts) for communication
crossIndustryInsights.application: Add interactive visualizations of before/after AI adoption scenarios

technicalImplementations.description: Calculate 0-100 urgency score based on pain points and timeline
Add confidence scores to all calculations based on data completeness
